value:
It feels a bit strange to suddenly be
surrounded by so many people... I
should be happy about it, shouldn't I?

Oh, Mother... Might I meet you again
in this world?

I'm relieved to see you patrolling the
castle, just like always. But don't
overtire yourself. We need you!

Did you need something? Oh, you're
just watching me work? That's odd.
But everyone's odd, sometimes...

This castle is so tranquil, so
peaceful... That's what I love about it.
I hope it stays like this forever.

It's so nice to meet you! I've
come to deliver a greeting from
$Nf.
This will help me help everyone.

I am Nanna, a descendant of House
Nordion. It is a pleasure to meet you.

I can tell that you've put a lot of
thought into my needs. It seems I
always end up relying on others.$k$pIn my world, people who are very
dear to me were hurt, but all I could
do was look on...$k$pI've been so frustrated by my own
powerlessness.$k$pFighting alongside you, though... I've
come to realize that battle is more
than simply crossing swords.$k$pI'll do my utmost to support you and
everyone else who is gathered here...$k$pAnd maybe, one day, I'll be able to
stand up and protect those who I
hold most dear.
I hope you can forgive me.
I am Nanna, daughter of Lachesis, and niece to Lord Eldigan.
Leif has always been so kind to me. We're as close as brother and sister...
Now that I'm older, I understand how my mother felt...
I've been praying for your safety.
